metadata.name: AMSI Bypass Pattern Assembly GetType
metadata.comment: Detects code fragments found in small and obfuscated AMSI bypass PowerShell scripts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[ref].assembly.gettype')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('setvalue($null,$true)')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('nonpublic,static')))

output.summary: Detects code fragments found in small and obfuscated AMSI bypass PowerShell scripts
